note: Journalist, activist, anarchist, unapologetic information junkie, writer/editor for hire. My books, thus far, are Polymath: The Life and Professions of Dr. Alex Comfort, Author of 'The Joy of Sex' (2023), The Operating System: An Anarchist Theory of the Modern State (2021), The Duty to Stand Aside: Nineteen Eighty-Four and the Wartime Quarrel of George Orwell and Alex Comfort (2018), and The People's Pension: The Struggle to Defend Social Security Since Reagan (2012).
